se.itu.game.cave

Class RuleBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.itu.game.cave.RuleBook

  • public class RuleBook
extends Object
    Represents the rule book for the things and special rooms in the Game. This is where to look to get the rules for picking a thing up, or for rules about Dragons and Snakes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addRoomRule(Room room, RoomRule rule)
      Provides a way to add new Rules for Rooms.
      static void addThingRule(Thing thing, ThingRule rule)
      Provides a way to add new Rules for Things.
      static RoomRule getRuleFor(Room room)
      Allows people to look up a RoomRule for a Room.
      static ThingRule getRuleFor(Thing thing)
      Allows people to look up a ThingRule for a Thing.

    • Method Detail

      • addThingRule

        public static void addThingRule(Thing thing,
                                ThingRule rule)
        Provides a way to add new Rules for Things.
        Parameters:
        thing - The Thing for which a rule is added
        rule - The ThingRule for the Thing

      • addRoomRule

        public static void addRoomRule(Room room,
                               RoomRule rule)
        Provides a way to add new Rules for Rooms.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room for which a rule is added
        rule - The RoomRule for the Thing

      • getRuleFor

        public static ThingRule getRuleFor(Thing thing)
        Allows people to look up a ThingRule for a Thing. If there is no rule for a Thing, the ThingRule will always allow the thing to be picked up - and no exception will be thrown from the rule.
        Parameters:
        thing - The Thing for which you want to look up the ThingRule
        Returns:
        The ThingRule for the requested Thing

      • getRuleFor

        public static RoomRule getRuleFor(Room room)
        Allows people to look up a RoomRule for a Room. If there is no rule for a Room, the RoomRule will always do nothing when applied, and the creatureDescription will always be empty.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room for which you want to look up the RoomRule
        Returns:
        The RoomRule for the requested Room
